txt_en: Patriotism is deeply rooted in the instincts and emotions of human being.
txt_cn: 爱国精神深深根植于人的本能和情感之中。

txt_en: It's time to start living the life you've imagined!
txt_cn: 是时候开始过自己想要的生活了！

txt_en: East or west, home is the best.
txt_cn: 金窝银窝不如自家的草窝。

txt_en: Don't look at your phone for more than two hours, because it will power off.
txt_cn: 千万不要连续看手机超过两个小时，因为那样手机会没电。

txt_en: At the place we don't know, there is always some sadness we haven't seen.
txt_cn: 在我们不曾了解的地方，总有些未曾看到的心酸。

txt_en: Whatever is going to happen will happen, whether we worry or not.
txt_cn: 不管你焦虑与否，该发生的总会发生。

txt_en: The end of the holiday feels like the end of the world.
txt_cn: 假期结束，末日来临。

txt_en: It is not more vacation we need—it is more vocation!
txt_cn: 我们需要的不是更多的假期，而是更强的使命感！

txt_en: Things do not change. We do.
txt_cn: 万物不变，是我们在变。

txt_en: Everything in the past is a mirror of wisdom.
txt_cn: 过往一切都是智慧的映射。

txt_en: Love is like the moon. When it does not increase, it decreases.
txt_cn: 爱情就像月亮，不增则减。

txt_en: Those who have knocked me down, thank you! It's so comfortable to lie down.
txt_cn: 那些曾经把我击倒的人，谢谢你们！躺平真舒服。

txt_en: I dreamed a lot when I was a child, but now I just want to get rich overnight.
txt_cn: 小时候的我梦想有很多，可现在我只想一夜暴富。

txt_en: The elderly is history and drama for reference of our lives.
txt_cn: 老人犹如历史和戏剧，可为我们的生活提供参考。

txt_en: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
txt_cn: 预测未来的最好方式就是去创造它。

txt_en: You make me want to be a better person.
txt_cn: 你让我想成为一个更好的人。

txt_en: If you are hopeful, you will be invincible.
txt_cn: 满怀希望，就会所向披靡。

txt_en: I know I have this great potential.
txt_cn: 我知道我有巨大的潜力。

txt_en: We turn not older with years, but newer every day.
txt_cn: 我们并非在年复一年地变老，而是日复一日地焕然一新。

txt_en: A rose by any other name would smell as sweet.
txt_cn: 玫瑰即使换了名字也依旧芬芳。

txt_en: Everything is dangerous. If it weren't so, life wouldn't be worth living.
txt_cn: 凡事皆有风险。若非如此，人生将不值一过。
